snippet.title: Shredded Secrets Trailer
snippet.description:
Shredded Secrets is a charming story-based 2D platformer that lets you step into the lives of four people at a middle school - Isabella, Taylor, London and Oakley. Now out on https://girlsmakegames.itch.io/shredded-secrets

Shredded Secrets was created by Team Sarcastic Shark Clouds, a group of middle school girls at the 2018 Girls Make Games Seattle Summer Camp. The game won Grand Prize at GMG’s 2018 Demo Day competition and went on to raise over $30K on Kickstarter. 

Team Sarcastic Shark Clouds: Crystal, Isadora, Keira, Gracie

To learn more, visit www.girlsmakegames.com
